title: Phase 1: Agent â†’ Generator Semantic Rename (Non-breaking)
description: Internal rename of all deterministic musical modules while maintaining API compatibility through shims. Create Generator classes (RhythmGenerator, HarmonyGenerator, MelodyGenerator, CompositionGenerator) and compatibility layer in packages/core/src/compat/. Update all internal documentation to use Generator terminology.

title: Phase 2: Schillinger Compliance Completion
description: Implement missing advanced Schillinger components: Intensity Field (value/slope/curvature with projection mapping), Probability of Coincidence (pulse/harmonic/orchestral convergence), Resultant Field Unification (cross-domain coherence), Structural Acceleration (intensity-driven cadence), Release Mechanics (engineered convergence). Deprecate style enums in favor of constraintsPresetId/intensityProfileId.

title: Phase 3: Dart SDK via FFI Implementation
description: Complete Dart SDK with C ABI wrapper architecture. Create packages/native/schillinger_cabi/ (C ABI wrapper), packages/dart/schillinger_sdk/ (typed Dart package). Implement handle-based API, memory management rules, threading safety (UI/worker isolates only), and platform-specific binary outputs (.dylib, .xcframework, .so, .dll).

title: Phase 4: Testing & Multi-Language Parity Framework
description: Comprehensive testing framework with golden tests across TypeScript, Swift, Native C ABI, and Dart wrapper implementations. ABI stability tests, realtime safety verification, performance benchmarks, and Schillinger mathematical correctness validation.
